What is Jay's Query?

Jay's Query is a small yet versatile JavaScript library. It was created by Justin Cox in 2018 to assist with DOM traversal and maipulation, event-handling, animation, and making AJAX requests.

Want to use Jay's Query?

Copy and paste this into the head of your project

<script> src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jayonethesk8/jaysQuery/dist/main.js"></script>
